set_bracket_role.help: Role to add when a player registers and is in this bracket

set_current_bracket_round.help: Sets the round of the current bracket

set_post_result_channel.help: Channel where the match results will be posted

clear_player_role.help: Removes the player role of users not present in the challonge
clear_player_role.users_role_not_removed:
__List of users that kept the role due to a system error:__
%1
clear_player_role.default:
List of all brackets:
%1
Use `%0clear_player_role $./parameter` to clear the player roles of a bracket.

give_player_role.help: Gives the player role of users not present in the challonge
give_player_role.users_role_not_added:
__List of users that didn't get the role due to a system error:__
%1
give_player_role.default:
List of all brackets:
%1
Use `%0give_player_role $./parameter` to give the player roles of a bracket.

copy_bracket.help: Copies the bracket settings of a bracket to another one.
copy_bracket.success: Successfully copied the settings of bracket `%1` to the bracket `%2`.
